quote: "That`s for me to know and for you dot dot dot."

"I saw Elena today, BTW - that means `by the way`. She was at cheerleading practice. She looks so perky in her little short shorts. Simmer down. I didn’t even go near her. I’ve got my own cheerleader now."
"It`s very Emerson how you reveal your soul. So many adjectives."
"I like you and your laugh."
"It`s cool not growing old. I like being the eternal stud."
"Doesn`t it always come down to the love of a woman?"
"I feel a little used, I thought we were having a moment. Now I`ll have to go to the party angry, who knows what I`ll do."
"What`s so special about this Bella girl? Edward`s so whipped."
"Some girls just can`t refuse my good looks, my style and my charm and my unflinching ability to listen to Taylor Swift."
"Why are you standing there. That`s a girl who clearly wants to be chased. You don`t do it I will."
"I`ve been in love. It`s painfull, it`s pointless and overrated"
"Oh tip for later: Be carefull who you invite in."
"Stefan smiles, alert the media."
"`Don`t forget I taught you how to play this game."
"We`re a team. We could travel the world together. We could try out for The Amazing Race!"
"Oh you were so much more fun when you were asleep."
"It`s not like we all hang out together at the vamp bar and grill."
"Vampires can`t procreate... though we love to try."
"You help me? I don`t know, that seems a little unnatural."
"Look at you, putting the pieces together."
"If I see a thing I haven`t seen before I throw a dollar at it."
"Do you know how liberating it is not having a master plan? Because I can do whatever the hell I want."
"I haven`t killed anybody in - too long."
"If I had a good side, thats not a way to get on it."
"No Elena! I will not go to your bedroom with you."
"Have I entered an alternate universe where Stefan is fun?"
"John... Whatever I can do to help keep this town safe, even if it means spending time with you."
"Great Elena. I`m walking on sunshine. Thanks for asking."
"Don’t pout. It’s not attractive in a woman your age."
"That`s me. Your trusty bodyguard. Calm in a crisis."
“No, I’m not upset. Upset is an emotion specific to those who care.”
"Katherine is a manipulative, nasty little slut."

“If this Wolf Man thing is true, I’ve seen enough movies to know it’s not good. It means Mason Lockwood is a real-life Lon Chaney and that little Tyler punk may just very well be Lon Chaney, Jr. which means Bela Lugosi, meaning me, is totally screwed.”
“Your search for life`s purpose is as obvious as it is tragic.”
"If we start believing in some supernatural witchy-woo from a picture book we’re idiots."
“Death would have been too kind.”
“Oh, teens today and their underage drinking. Tragic.”
“Can we not do the whole road trip bonding thing? The cliché of it all makes me itch."
"A, He can`t do anything about it and B, what I just said."
"You brought back John Gilbert? That was your big save Elena move?"
"Yes Stefan, I`ve become you. How tragic for both of us."
"There`s no such thing as a bad idea. Only poorly executed awesome ones."
"That might be your plan. Mine`s better."
“I’ll write her a great eulogy!”
"You`re feisty when you`re mad."
"Road trip! I call shot gun."
"I like that confidence, Stefan. I don’t share it, but I like it. "
"Makes you the third person to underestimate me today."
"Can`t Bonnie just ju-ju him or something?"
"Elena, you almost got barbecued. The least I can do is apply first aid."
"I`m pretty sure I just got spit-roasted by Mason Lockwood`s ghost."
"When I kill someone, they`re supposed to stay dead."
"Tyler can`t be saved, not when Klaus is around, which is like always."
"You`re right. I didn`t have to kill you. I do a lot of things I don`t have to do."
"All that effort wasted trying to tell you how boring you were, and now you finally agree with me?"
"Well, I give you 10 points for flair."
"Perfect. We have narrowed it down to nowhere."
"Yoohoo. Anybody home? Big bad vampire out here."
"Caroline, you and me is not going to happen."
"For over a century, I`ve lived in secret. Hiding in the shadows, alone in the world. Until now. I`m a vampire and this is my story."
"Let them drive a stake through my heart, because then I`m at least free of you."
"Says the girl who spends her alone time writing in a cemetery."
"Yes, being a 150 year old teenager has been the height of my happiness."Enter a quote
"I knew I couldn`t spike your drink. So I spiked hers."
"That`s the thing about Damon. He doesn`t get mad. He just gets even."
"I didn`t care I had something my brother wanted. I didn`t even care if I hurt him. I only knew that I wanted her."
"The Salvatore brothers, best friends."
"I`ve been seventeen years old since 1864."
"Everything you know, everything you believe is about to change. Are you ready for that?"
"What Damon wants, Damon usually gets."
"Damon and I. Looks like we`re stuck with each other."
"If you`re so worried that someone is on to you, why don`t you just leave town, Damon?"
"Hey, look at me. We choose our own path. Our values and our actions? They define who we are."
"Imagine every sense in your body operating at superspeed."
"It`s difficult to seperate your feelings. Love, lost, anger, desire, it can all blur into one urge. Hunger."
"No, no, no, not like that. She`s not exactly a girl. Lexi`s just 350 years old."
"I don`t wanna be his enemy, Elena, but I can`t let him do it."
"I don`t think Damon knows what to believe. Trust isn`t something that comes naturally to him."
"So you show up like Van Helsing?"
"If you`re here for revenge, this is going to end very badly for you."
"Damon can never know why you`re here. He`ll kill you without blinking."
"Please dance with your alcoholic vampire boyfriend."
"I`m not sad... I`m freakin` hungry!"
"I don`t hurt people. I don`t do that. I`m the good brother."
"Don’t flirt with me Katherine. I’m not Damon, I haven’t spent 145 years obsessed with you."

"The truth? Well, the truth is you`re the same lying, selfish, manipulative bitch that you`ve always been. So whatever it is that brought you here, let`s just get on with it and leave town. Because if you don`t, I will hunt you down and rip your heart out."
"I`m just happy that a bloodbag, and not a sorority girl, is supplying you dinner."
"I see the usual restraint has been exercised."
"The pleasure of watching you suffer is greater then any pain I`ll ever feel."
“He’s an Original. I don’t really know what that means. I don’t think anybody really knows what that means.”
“Without a full moon, you’re no match for me.”
"Who wants do die next?"
"Hunt. Prey. Kill. It was all I knew."
"You`re right. Thank you... for being in love with my girlfriend."
"To beat the villain, Damon, you have to be the better villain."
"If you don`t drink it, Ray, I will. Problem is I don`t know how to stop."
"Happy to know you still care."
"My brother`s got his flirt on and you`re jealous.It`s all right. Be jealous, by all means. I`m sure Damon will be thrilled."

"You do have reason to worry, but if I look back at our history of epic plan failures, it`s usually because one of us let their humanity get in the way. If I`m taken odds on how this thing goes down it`s certainly not going to be me, who screws up."
"And you just happen to be hanging around a cementary."
"It`s all about the coffee, aunt Jenna"
"For once I don`t regret the day before it begins. Because I know I`ll see him again. For the first time in a long time I feel good."
"Trust is earned. I can`t just magically hand it over."
"I`m not going to be one of those pathetic girls, whose world stops spinning because of some guy."
"I think that my paranoia has turned into full-blown hallucinations."
"If you mean me no harm then you`ll go."
"I couldn`t miss your hundred and whatever birthday."
"I thought I couldn`t be with you Stefan, but I can. You don`t have to push me away. I can do this."
"I look like her."
"I used to be more fun."
"If he`s trying to kill me, why call first?"
"Trust breeds trust. You have to give it to get it."
"I`m not blaming you Damon, I`ve accepted the fact that your a selfserving psychopath with no human quality`s."
"I would say drop dead but..."
"Our actions are what sets things in motion, but we have to live with that."
"You see the problem with such hatred? It’s gonna get you killed."
"Asked? You threatend him."
“No, no, Damon, listen, I care about you. I do. But I love Stefan. It’s always gonna be Stefan.”
"I don`t wanna talk about Damon or anything else that`s vampire related."
"I`m human and I have to do human stuff otherwise I`m gonna get crazy."
"According to a legend: A Werewolf bite can kill a vampire."
"You know what? Friends don`t manipulate friends. They help each other."
"I made myself clear, Damon. I want nothing to do with you."
"I hate fighting with you, even if it`s fake."
"I saw her Stefan. How could you hate her and be in love with me?"
"It`s you and me, Stefan. Always."
"So you`re saying that the oldest vampire in the history of time is coming after me?"
"There`s a whole family of originals?"
"What, are you saying that Klaus can`t be killed?"
"I can`t lose anyone else I love."
"You know if you keep pushing people away, you’re gonna end up alone."
"6 AM? Seriously? You have nothing better to do at 6 AM?"
[About her necklace] "It`s an antique, Damon. Like you."
"I told you I was practically discovered by Klaus and you are worried about what I am wearing?"
"Like one obnoxious Salvatore isn`t enough."
"Find someone else to play with. Maybe you can compel yourself a friend."
"Don`t be [sorry]. You had hope. That was all I ever wanted you to have. And you had it."
"You asked me to make a choice Damon, so I did. If you are going to be mad, take it out on me. Not on Stefan or Matt or anyone else, me."
"But I get to live. I`ll be a sister and a friend. I`ll be with you. Forever. I`m going to get through this, just like through everything. One day at a time."
"No, you look like a full-grown alpha male douchebag."
"First person account of the Civil War? That`s like porn for a history teacher."
"Oke, I`ll get my garlic and holy water."
"A ring to ward off the demons, huh?"
"I think Stefan is a good guy. But at the end of the day, he`s still a vampire."
"I don`t wanna spend my life searching for answers I really don`t want."
"I`m every parent`s worst nightmare. I`m the chaperone teacher from hell."
"I`m not a rolemodel you know. I drink too much, I say the wrong things, I encourage bad behaviour."
"This may come as a shock, but I am not here to hang out with you."
"I`m fine. I think the ring, however is running low on batteries."
"You know, I’ll feel decidedly less pathetic if I don’t drink alone."
"Look at you, one of nature’s most hideous creatures and you can’t even get that right."
"You’re worse than I ever was. Spineless, pathetic."
"You wanna hunt down a pack of werewolves on a full moon?"
"I think you found a way to get out of bed this morning. And that makes you the strongest person I know."
"Parental authority. I like it."
"What do you think that stuff is worth, you know like on Ebay?"
"You realise you had to ask him, to ask you, don`t you? You figure that if you dress up like a respectable young lady he`ll finally treat you like one?"
"I`m a drug using deliquent, girl in bed doesn`t really rank, sorry."
"Your lips keep moving, I don`t know why."
"I know what I saw, but I don`t understand."
"I`m just surprised to see you here. Art mostly implies culture and well culture doesn`t imply you."
"You`re kidding me right? There`s no such thing as vampires."
"Well, I kinda miss my daily dose of cute stalker chick."
[To Anna] "You kind of like dead people huh?"
"Even if I can`t remember why, I still feel empty, alone. Making me forget won`t fix it."
"You mean I`m not a vampire? Dammit."
"I was killed by a vampire and brought back by a magic ring. How do you move forward from that?"
“But you’re a hundred percent witch. That is so cool.”
"None of us are gonna make it out of this town alive."
"I shot a hybrid in the back and chopped his head off with a meat cleaver. Typical Sunday, huh?”
"Fine, fine, but can we do this later? My friend just got here and yes, Damon, I actually have some. I’ll call you when I’m done."
"Whatever my last moment was with her... I don`t have it."
"What can be more horrible than you turning into a vampire. I need my sister. Not another one of them."
"I got the other brother. Hope you don`t mind."
"Elena used to be way more fun. And I`m saying that with complete sensitivity."
"Does it look like I do dishes?"
"I am gonna drink until someone is hot enough to make out with."
"So it`s true, I`m shallow. I`m worst than shallow, I`m a kiddy pool."
"Do you ever feel like there`s no person in the world who loves you?"
"That`s like two `hey`s`. Don`t you have any other words in your vocabulary?"
"Screw Damon."
"This Emily chick has some serious explaining to do."
"If you want something done right, you have to do it yourself."
"Is this like a threesome now? You and the Salvatore brothers?"
"I`m a terrible, awful person, but I`m working on it."
"This is much better than watching Damon visit cougartown."
"I want this and I actually deserve this."
"I have a message from Katherine. She said `Game On`."
"I`m a terrible liar... I`m even worse at duplicity."
"You had to break out the girlfriend code."
"There`s a reason it`s called a curse, Tyler."
"You`re asking for the truth from someone who`s probably never given it."
“Everyone just needs to stop kissing me!”
“I’m okay. I’m not girly little Caroline anymore. I can handle myself.”
"Well, I think a Salvatore would look a lot better in a tux, and by that, I mean Stefan."
"Tyler, it doesn`t matter how many times I dance with him [Klaus]. I love you."
"So, you are not like, switching Salvatores, are you?"
"How did he plan a better party than me so fast? Wait, is that a band outside?"
"Caroline Forbes, when have you ever kept a secret in your life?"
"This is my fault. I planted doubt. I`m a doubt-planter."
"It`s true. I`m a witch."
"The Elena that I know would always want to know the truth, good or bad."
"You just found out that your boyfriend is a vampire.... so unless you`re parents are aliens... how bad could it be?"
"I was going to say, get some more coffee, get a cafeine buzz and do god..do something crazy."
"Your my friend Elena. If you need me I`m here for you. And I`m sorry I couldn`t show you that yesterday."
"I know you love Elena and you wanna be with her but it`s risky. Too many people can get hurt."
"It`s just... you`re Elena`s brother."
“Hey, uh, speaking of happy, would it freak you out if I started dating your brother?”
"You`ve already claimed your birthday as everyone`s favorite day of the year.
"I`ve got a ghost problem to deal with, Caroline. Save the Jeremy lecture for later."
